google_google_kms_key_ring_iam.description: Collection of resources to manage IAM policy for a Google Cloud KMS key ring.

key_ring_id.description: The key ring ID, in the form

member/members.description: Identities that will be granted the privilege in `role`.

role.description: The role that should be applied. Only one

expression.description: Textual representation of an expression in Common Expression Language syntax.

title.description: A title for the expression, i.e. a short string describing its purpose.

description.description: An optional description of the expression. This is a longer text which describes the expression, e.g. when hovered over it in a UI.

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the key ring's IAM policy.
